acf.title: Chief Administrative Officer and Chief Financial Officer
acf.bio_copy:
Daniel Widawsky is Chief Administrative Officer and Chief Financial Officer. He is responsible for overseeing Finance, Tax, and Corporate Services and Real Estate.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2024, Dan had an extensive career in finance, tax planning and management. From 2018, he was Executive Vice President and Vice Dean, Chief Financial Officer, for NYU Langone Health.

He has also served as Director of, and then advisor to, EFO Management, LLC, a family management office, over the past eight years. Prior to this role, he served as the Comptroller for the City of Chicago and previously was a Managing Director and Partner at Citadel.

Dan holds a BA in Economics from the University of California, Berkeley and a JD from Yale Law School.
